ygData.subject: Time for tinkering
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow tinkerers... I have begun a process on Bertoxxulous Server to unite the Gnomes of Norrath under one banner. I have started the Guild GNOME FORCE!! This
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow tinkerers...
I have begun a process on Bertoxxulous Server to unite the Gnomes of Norrath
under one banner.
I have started the Guild GNOME FORCE!!
This Guild is comprised of GNOMES GNOMES GNOMES!!!
We will be tackling all things Gnomish including the ever elusive Tinkering
Problems we all seem to be having.
If anyone is on bertoxx or wants a guild that will cater to their every
gnomish need then Gnome Force is the guild for you.
our guildhall will soon be going up with a compilation of all thinks
tinkered once this is set we will post here any new finding we may have to
share our wealth of knowledge. All we ask is that if you have a small tidbit
of interest let us know we would love to swap knowledge with our fellow
gnomes.

Thanks for listening and good hunting.

Dillgaar Rhine
Warrior of the 19th Blade
Bertoxxulous server
